src:
Mie Gerobak Enak
Ngeunah Pisan! 5 Mie Ayam Gerobakan Paling Hits dan Enak di Bogor
05 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood



FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak Jakarta - Kota Bogor punya banyak kuliner enak. Salah satunya mie ayam gerobakan, yang diracik dengan bahan sederhana, namun rasanya tetap menggugah selera.Selain aneka hidangan khas Pasundan yang beragam. Kota Bogor punya banyak jajanan enak, salah satu yang harus dicoba ada aneka mie ayam gerobak. Tak kalah dengan mie di restoran, racikan mie gerobak ini punya banyak penggemar, apalagi dengan harga yang terjangkau.Contohnya seperti mie ayam Bohay yang terkenal dengan tambahan tauge dan bawang putih di atasnya. Ada juga Mie Ayam Bang Dores, yang selalu ludes terjual dengan menu spesial mie ayam menggunakan ceker dicampur sambal pedas.Berikut lima tempat makan mie ayam gerobakan di Bogor, yang paling enak dan populer.Baca Juga: Favorit Banyak Orang, 5 Mie Ayam Gerobak Ini Wajib Dicoba! (sob/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Istimewa

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Jalan-jalan ke Bogor dan ngidam makan mie ayam enak terjangkau? Mampir saja ke Mie Ayam Gang Ambi, yang letaknya ada di Jalan Merdeka, di dalam Gang Ambi II. Sesuai namanya, mie ayam gerobakan ini letaknya di dalam gang, dengan meja kayu sederhana.Meski begitu mie ayam ini selalu laris, dan populer di kota Bogor. Ciri khas menu mie ayam di sini, disajikan dengan dua buah pangsit basah dan dua butir bakso dengan harga Rp 15.000 saja. Mie ayam ini punya rasa yang asin gurih, dengan mie pipih kenyal.Buka dari jam 10 pagi, banyak orang yang rela mengantre untuk bisa makan mie ayam ini. Meskipun tempatnya kecil, tapi animo pengunjung tetap besar. Porsi mie yang ditawarkan juga royal, dengan taburan daging ayam serta sayuran sawi yang melimpah.Mie Ayam Bakso Gang AmbiJalan Merdeka, Gang Ambi II.Kec. Bogor Tengah (samping toko Krystal Merdeka).
(sob/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Istimewa

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Terletak di wilayah Bangbarung, ada mie ayam gerobakan yang sudah terkenal sejak dulu. Berbeda dengan mie ayam gerobak pada biasanya, di sini varian mie nya lebih beragam, dengan topping yang lebih melimpah.Ciri khas dari Mie Ayam Bohay terletak pada sayuran tauge, sawi, serta bubuhan bawang putih goreng di atasnya. Pilihan mie nya ada ayam mie lebar, atau mie keriting. Bagian atas mie, dipadukan dengan topping daging ayam cincang.Tak ketinggalan, tambahan semangkuk bakso dengan kuah kaldu gurih kecokelatan. Kisaran harga Mie Ayam Bohay dimulai dari Rp 16.000 saja. Tersedia juga menu mie ayam lada hitam, hingga tambahan nasi putih bagi pengunjung yang ekstra lapar.Mie Ayam BohayJalan Ahmad Sobana, Bangbarung.Kecamatan Bogor Utara, Bogor.
(sob/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Istimewa

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Kalau mau makan mie ayam gerobak yang satu ini, harus datang di pagi hari, karena mie ayam ini sangat cepat habisnya. Buka sejak jam 9 pagi, gerobak Mie Ayam Bang Dores bisa ditemukan di wilayah Stasiun Bogor.Mie Ayam bang Dores sudah berjualan sejak 1984, dan tidak berkeliling lagi, karena sudah punya pelanggan tetap. Dibandingkan dengan mie ayam lainnya, porsi mie ayam ini lebih minimalis, tapi cukup mengenyangkan, karena ada tambahan pangsit basah hingga ceker kuah sambal.Gaya mie ayam gerobak terlihat dari racikan mie Bang Dores, dengan tambahan sawi, ayam kecap, dan pangsit goreng. Kisaran harganya cukup terjangkau, dimulai dari Rp 12.000 hingga 15.000 saja.Mie Ayam Bang DoresJl. Paledang Blok Sekolah No.7, Paledang.Bogor Tengah, Bogor.Telp: 0857-8275-7979
(sob/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Istimewa

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Terkenal dengan nama Mie Ayam Ojo Dumeh Mas Endhut, gerobak mie ayam ini tak pernah sepi dari pengunjung. Sudah berjualan lebih dari 20 tahun, banyak yang bilang Mie Ayam Ojo Dumeh ini salah satu mie ayam terenak di Bogor.Lokasinya di Jalan Padjadjaran, dekat dengan Bank BTPN. Meski sederhana, pelanggannya sudah tak terhitung. Ciri khas dari mie ayam di sini, mie nya punya tekstur yang lebih lembut, dengan paduan sawi, dan daging ayam dadu tanpa tulang yang empuk.Untuk topping tambahan, ada menu pangsit rebus dan bakso yang bisa dipisang terpisah atau dicampur langsung ke dalam mangkuk mie ayam. Kisaran harganya dimulai dari Rp 10.000 saja. Seharinya warung Mie Ayam Ojo Dumeh ini mampu menjual lebih dari 400 mangkok.Mie Ayam Ojo DumehJl. Pajajaran, Bantarjati, Bogor Utara.Di samping Bank BTPN Pajajaran.
(sob/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Istimewa

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Sebagai penggemar mie ayam, sayang untuk melewatkan Mie Ayam Kang Kosim di Bogor. Mie ayam gerobak ini sudah populer, dan jadi jajanan favorit orang Bogor, yang selalu bikin nagih. Dengan tampilan mie ayam sederhana, tapi rasanya tidak mengecewakan.Lokasinya tak jauh dari Taman Kencana. Mie ayam disajikan langsung dengan kuah yang tak terpisah, dengan tambahan ayam kecap tanpa tulang, bakso, hingga sambel rawit hijau yang super pedas dan menggoda selera.Berbeda dengan mie ayam lainnya, di sini tidak ada kerupuk pangsit. Tapi tidak mengurangi kelezatan dari mie ayam gerobakan ini. Porsinya juga cukup banyak dan mengenyangkan, dengan kisaran harga sekitar Rp 15.000 saja.Mie Ayam Kosim Taman KencanaJl. Ceremai Ujung, Bantarjati, Kec. Bogor Utara, Kota Bogor.Telp: 0856-9539-3930Baca Juga: Pencinta Mie Wajib Sarapan di 5 Kedai Mie Ayam Enak dan Mantap Ini
(sob/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
text:
Delicious Noodle Carts
Ngeunah Pisan! 5 Most Delicious and Delicious Chicken Cart Noodles in Bogor
05 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood



NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak Jakarta - Bogor City has a lot of delicious culinary. One of them is chicken cart noodles, which are formulated with simple ingredients, but the taste is still appetizing. In addition to a variety of typical Pasundan dishes. Bogor city has a lot of delicious snacks, one of which must be tried is a variety of chicken cart noodles. Not inferior to the noodles in the restaurant, this cart noodle concoction has many fans, especially at an affordable price. Examples such as Bohay chicken noodles are famous for the addition of bean sprouts and garlic on it. There is also Bang Dores Chicken Noodle, which is always sold out with a special menu of chicken noodles using clams mixed with spicy chilli sauce. Here are five places to eat chicken noodle carts in Bogor, the most delicious and popular ones. Also Read: Many People's Favorites, 5 These Chicken Noodle Carts Must Try! (sob / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Gerobak Enak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Special

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
Traveling to Bogor and craving for affordable tasty chicken noodles? Just stop by Mie Ayam Gang Ambi, which is located on Jalan Merdeka, inside Gang Ambi II. As the name implies, this chicken cart noodle is located in an alley, with a simple wooden table. Even so, this chicken noodle is always in demand, and is popular in the city of Bogor. The special feature of the chicken noodle menu here is served with two wet dumplings and two meatballs at a price of Rp. This chicken noodle has a salty savory taste, with chewy flat noodles. Open from 10 am, many people are willing to queue to be able to eat this chicken noodle. Although the place is small, but the interest of visitors is still great. The portion of noodles offered is also generous, with a sprinkling of chicken meat and abundant mustard greens. Chicken Bakso Gang AmbiJalan Merdeka, Gang Ambi II.Kec. Bogor Tengah (next to the Krystal Merdeka store).
(sob / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Gerobak Enak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Special

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
Located in the Bangbarung area, there is a cart chicken noodle that has been famous for a long time. In contrast to the cart chicken noodles in general, here the variants of the noodles are more diverse, with more abundant toppings. The hallmark of Bohay Chicken Noodles lies in the bean sprouts, mustard greens, and the topping of fried garlic on it. Choice of noodles is chicken wide noodles, or curly noodles. The top of the noodles, combined with minced chicken meat topping. Not to be left behind, add a bowl of meatballs with savory brown broth. The price range of Bohay Chicken Noodles starts from Rp. 16,000 only. There is also a menu of black pepper chicken noodles, to the addition of white rice for extra hungry visitors. Chicken Bohay Street Ahmad Sobana, Bangbarung. Bogor Utara District, Bogor.
(sob / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Gerobak Enak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Special

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
If you want to eat this chicken cart noodle, you have to come in the morning, because this chicken noodle runs out very fast. Open from 9 am, the Mie D Bang Bang cart can be found in the Bogor Station area. My Chicken Bang Dores has been selling since 1984, and does not go around anymore, because it already has regular customers. Compared to other chicken noodles, the portion of chicken noodles is more minimalist, but it is quite filling, because there are additional wet dumplings to chili sauce clumps. The price range is quite affordable, starting from Rp 12,000 to 15,000. My Chicken Bang DoresJl. Paledang Blok Sekolah No.7, Paledang. Bogor Tengah, Bogor. Tel: 0857-8275-7979
(sob / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Gerobak Enak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Special

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
Known as Mie Mie Ojo Dumeh Mas Endhut, this chicken noodle cart is never empty of visitors. Having been selling for more than 20 years, many say that Ojo Dumeh Chicken Noodle is one of the most delicious chicken noodles in Bogor. The location is on Jalan Padjadjaran, close to Bank BTPN. Although simple, the customers are countless. Characteristic of chicken noodles here, the noodles have a softer texture, with a combination of mustard greens, and tender boneless boned chicken meat. For additional toppings, there is a menu of boiled dumplings and meatballs that can be banana separated or mixed directly into a noodle bowl chicken. The price range starts from Rp. 10,000 only. A day this Ojo Dumeh Chicken Noodle stall is able to sell more than 400 bowls. My Chicken Ojo DumehJl Chicken. Pajajaran, Bantarjati, North Bogor. Next to the Bank BTPN Pajajaran.
(sob / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Gerobak Enak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Special

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
As a fan of chicken noodles, it's a shame to miss Kang Kosim's Chicken Noodle in Bogor. Chicken cart noodles are already popular, and become a favorite snack of Bogor people, who always make a collection. With the appearance of simple chicken noodles, but the taste does not disappoint. The location is not far from Taman Kencana. Chicken noodles are served directly with an inseparable sauce, with the addition of boneless soy sauce chicken, meatballs, to super spicy green cayenne sauce and tempting tastes. Different from other chicken noodles, here there is no dumpling crackers. But it does not reduce the delicacy of this chicken car noodle. The portions are also quite plentiful and filling, with a price range of around Rp. 15,000. My Chicken Kosim Taman Kencana Jl. Ceremai Ujung, Bantarjati, Kec. Bogor Utara, Kota Bogor. Tel: 0856-9539-3930 Also Read: Noodle Noodles Must Have Breakfast at 5 Delicious and Delicious Chicken Noodle Shops
(sob / odi) NEWS FOCUS NEW Delicious Mie Gerobak
